web.title: dark-switch
web.description: It is a custom element wrapper around postcss-dark-theme-class

web.title: formally
web.description: A wrapper around the web platform validation

web.title: showcase-audit
web.description: A simple 11ty based site that benchmarks some sites

joomla.title: Responsive Content Images
joomla.description: A plugin for responsive images using the picture element. Supports Webp

joomla.title: Gzip Control
joomla.description: A plugin for disabling gzip for various bots, (Facebook, Linkedin)

joomla.title: export-to-md
joomla.description: A simple CLI script for exporting Joomla articles to .md files. Supports also K2

joomla.title: com-export2md
joomla.description: A simple component for exporting Joomla articles to .md files

joomla.title: Sloth
joomla.description: A Joomla 4 starter template for PWA/SPA

joomla.title: frontpage-svelte
joomla.description: A simple svelte SPA that creates a Joomla component (by Michael Babker) for managing landing pages.

joomla.title: frontpage
joomla.description: A simple hyperHTML SPA that creates a Joomla component (by Michael Babker) for managing landing pages.

joomla.title: sloth-pkg
joomla.description: A complete package for the Sloth template.

joomla.title: images-lazy-loading
joomla.description: A simple plugin that backports the version 4 lazyloading for images.

joomla.title: com-addlazyloading
joomla.description: A simple component that prepares the db images entries for the version 4.

joomla.title: custom-edit-forms-per-cat
joomla.description: A simple plugin that allows for a custom edit form per category.

joomla.title: plugin-webcomponents
joomla.description: A simple plugin that backports the Web Components support to version 3.
